name: gateway
description: Enable public web traffic for the component, the ingress API matches K8s v1.20+.

parameters.usage: Specify the domain you want to expose
parameters.name: domain

parameters.usage: Specify the mapping relationship between the http path and the workload port
parameters.name: http

parameters.usage: Specify the class of ingress to use
parameters.name: class

parameters.usage: Set ingress class in '.spec.ingressClassName' instead of 'kubernetes.io/ingress.class' annotation.
parameters.name: classInSpec

parameters.usage: Specify the secret name you want to quote to use tls.
parameters.name: secretName

parameters.usage: Specify the host of the ingress gateway, which is used to generate the endpoints when the host is empty.
parameters.name: gatewayHost

parameters.usage: Specify a unique name for this gateway, required to support multiple gateway traits on a component
parameters.name: name

parameters.usage: Specify a pathType for the ingress rules, defaults to "ImplementationSpecific"
parameters.name: pathType
